markdownRemark.excerpt:
I wish time would just pass
Cuz I wouldn’t last
Even a day without my vices
Been inebriated for ages
My mind’s stuck on the past
Not a chance of getting back
If…
markdownRemark.html: I wish time would just pass Cuz I wouldn’t last Even a day without my vices Been inebriated for ages My mind’s stuck on the past Not a chance of getting back If I don’t stay sober, All the games are over Now it’s time to take a chance And run the last of the mazes It’s time to be courageous And take a stride Of action, so much inaction My brain’s gonna blast I’ve nothing to do and no one to meet All my friends, they’re in the past I got no purpose, I got no ambition Can I just skip to the last Part of me wants to be in the moment And make most of it while I can But goddamn time is so fuckin’ elastic But the present is everlasting, it’s so plastic
